message_text: Hey Sri Teja, I’m Vikas, a current grad student at UMBC, applying for Software Engineer role at Salesforce. I’d love your take—would you be open to a referral? I bring over 1.5 years of relevant experience and am happy to share my resume. Thanks!
Hi, sure, which job id are you looking for?
Thanks Sri Teja, for offering me a referral. I am interested in the Software Engineering AMTS/MTS role, with job requisition id: JR26456. Below attached is my resume.

Hi Molly, thanks for connecting! I’m Vikas, a UMBC grad student applying to the Walgreens Data Scientist role with job id: 1578368BR.
 
I bring nearly 2 years of ML experience, with projects delivering 97% accuracy and 30% faster inference. 
 
I’ve attached my résumé and a recommendation letter. Would you be open to a quick 10–15 min chat this week? I’d love to share why I’m a strong fit and hopefully secure an interview.(Edited)
Hello- Thank you for reaching out. I am not the recruiter for that role, but they will review your application and contact you directly if they want to move forward.
Thanks, Molly for the info.😃

hey this is kulsum
I am a 2nd semester MSIS graduate student and UMBC. I see that you are a grader and i have been reaching out to professor for grader positions too. 
Just wanted your resume for reference, or if you can tell me what should i include in my resume to increase my chances.

Hello Kulsum, the grader position at the Data science department depends on your coursework taken and grades achieved. 

I used the following template to make my resume : https://www.overleaf.com/latex/templates/jakes-resume/syzfjbzwjncs
My resume can be downloaded at vvikasreddy.github.io ; sorry for the inconvenience I'm out of town.
No problem
Thankyou

Hi Amanda Araneda, 

I noticed how passionately you invited candidates to connect in your previous role—your enthusiasm really stood out. I’m very interested in the ML Engineer position at Somatus because of its focus on Python ML and healthcare data.

I have a Master’s in Data Science and 1.5 years developing Python ML pipelines with SQL, Git, JIRA, and Linux. I’ve containerized services with Docker on AWS and applied NLP to healthcare datasets to drive better patient insights.

Could we schedule a 10-minute chat next week to discuss the role and Somatus’s priorities?

Regards, 
Vikas Reddy. 
Portfolio : https://vvikasreddy.github.io/
GitHub: https://github.com/vvikasreddy/

Hey Sadhana, I’m Vikas, a current grad student at UMBC, applying for Data Scientist role at Itron. I’d love your take—would you be open to a referral? I bring over 1.5 years of relevant experience and am happy to share my resume. Thanks!
Sure, please send me the position that you are referring to

Thanks Sadhana for the quick reply, I realize that we have completed our BTech from IARE, feels good connecting to the Alma Matter. 

JR100400 is the job id I am interested in, and below attached is my resume.(Edited)
Hi, I feel the same.
Sorry I couldn't find the job role here internally to refer you. Could you see if you have an option to put me as referaal while applying
let me check
I will endorse you after you put me as your referral.

I have reached the end of the application, but there seems to be no option to specify you as my referee. let me also share the job link, to avoid the confusion https://itron.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/Early_Careers/details/Data-Scientist_JR100400
I searched for the same position internally it's not available
I see, in that case I will apply externally. Thanks again for your time.
I am sorry
No worries, I was just wondering if your team or any other adjacent teams are looking to fill data scientist or software engineer positions ?
No, not that I am aware of
Can you please keep me in mind if positions are available and also would it be crazy to ask forward my resume to your manager or hiring reps; this would mean a lot.
Actually, even if a position is available in my team my manager is only looking for citizens so it will not be of any help.
Understood, thanks !
This message has been deleted.

Hi Deborah Rheem,

I’m reaching out regarding the AI/ML Engineer role at Fortive with Job id: 5645. As a Data Science graduate student at UMBC with hands-on MLOps and deep learning experience, I believe I’d be a strong fit. My current work includes deploying scalable ML pipelines and optimizing inference on embedded systems.

I’ve worked with technologies like PyTorch, MLflow, Docker, and Kubernetes, and built solutions combining NLP, computer vision, and real-time data processing. Provation’s focus on innovative, responsible AI in healthcare strongly aligns with my passion and skills.

I’ve attached my resume and a recommendation letter from my professor who oversaw my AI research. I’d love the chance to connect and share how I can contribute to your team.

Best regards,
Vikas Reddy

I don't think so

You're welcome

Hi Jessica Brabant,

Hope you are doing well!, and congrats on your new role as a technical recruiter at Redwood Trust. 

I’m reaching out to express my interest in the Junior Data Analyst role. I’m currently pursuing my Master’s in Data Science at UMBC (GPA 4.0), and I’ve had hands-on experience with data cleaning, analysis, and dashboarding both in academic research and during my internship at EPAM Systems. I’m comfortable working with Python, SQL, and tools like Tableau, and I really enjoy turning raw data into clear, actionable insights.

What sets me apart is my ability to work across teams and simplify technical findings for non-technical audiences—something I’ve done while building emotion recognition tools and automating QA processes. I’m eager to bring that same energy and clarity to your team.

Below I am attaching my resume, and a recommendation letter from my professor where I worked as a Research Assistant. 

Thanks for considering my application. I’d love the chance to chat further.

Best,
Vikas
📞 (443)-992-2554
✉️ wh22215@umbc.edu
